A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute waste of time and money. Could have been 30 minutes shorter if they had removed all the phony and long drawn out moments of personal introspection. Even the light sabre fight scenes where amateurish in their choreography\, they looked like something from the 1980's. Wasted $17 each for 3 iMax tickets\, not sure what the fanboys see in this drivel.
